newsitem.title: USA: Interpool to redeem 5-3/4 pct preferred.
newsitem.headline: Interpool to redeem 5-3/4 pct preferred.

text.p: Interpool Inc said Friday it would redeem its outstanding 5-3/4 percent convertible preferred shares, primarily using proceeds from a recently completed sale of $75 million in capital securities.
The preferred shares, originally issued in September, 1995, will be redeemed on March 10 at $103.675 a share, plus accrued dividends up to the date of redemption, it said.
The shares are convertible into Interpool common shares on or before the redemption date at a conversion price of $23.37 per share, it said.
Interpool currently has 758,694 shares of 5-3/4 percent preferred stock outstanding with total liquidation value of $75.9 million.
The company is a lessor of cargo containers used in international trade.
